data.Name: Hip Hop Co-Op feat. BBMC
data.Description: A Northern Colorado hip hop spotlight hosted by The Bad Neighborhood (Nick Sanville and Phonosapien). Date is a mix of slotted performances and an open mic session! Turn up to test your skills and end up on the next Co-Op bill!Featured Artists:Pj KoolSaijForever True CrewMoxi Theater is operating at Full CapacityReserve a Table in Advance Online.All Responsible Ages Permitted*PHOTO ID REQUIRED FOR ENTRYThe Moxi Theater is proudly partnered with Lunas Tacos s is located at 806 9th St. - next door to the Moxi and is open for Dinner, Happy Hour, and Late Night. Lunas is the perfect place to eat and drink before or after the show!Stellas Pinball Arcade s directly beneath the Moxi before the show. Now serving Burgers, Apps, Cocktails, Icees, and fun for all ages. Open 6 days a week!
